alert.note: Alert for Tishomingo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 01 at 3:22PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Tishomingo County through 345 PM CST... At 322 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Belmont, or near Red Bay, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Belmont, Golden, Dennis and Bloody Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for northeastern Mississippi.
